translations: 卷轴，线轴；绕线轮，缠线框
缠绕，卷在线轴上；被放出；假脱机；发动起来；把……输入中间存储

sentences.sentence: This time I'll do it right with a spool of thread.
sentences.translation: 这次我会用一轴线把它弄好的。

sentences.sentence: Their stories spool out as Kitson hits "on" buttons in sequence.
sentences.translation: 凯特森依次点击“开始”按钮，他们的故事开始展开。

sentences.sentence: Adding a spool file object set.
